data.eml:eml: Further studies of African Acylophorus Nordmann (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lott, Derek A. (2012): Further studies of African Acylophorus Nordmann (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae). Zootaxa 3168: 39-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279788
